[main] 5 failures in test testStatsMissingFieldWithStats (1.0% fail rate in 510 executions) - [main] 3 failures in pipeline elasticsearch-periodic-platform-support (27.3% fail rate in 11 executions) **Note:** This issue was created using new test triage automation. BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Simplify InternalOrder.isOrder a little (#122372) No need for recursion here. We don't allow nested compound order instances so this thing works exactly as the JavaDoc states and we only need to check one level down.
